dt: {bc}a very steep, vertical, or overhanging face of rock, earth, or ice {bc}{sx|precipice||}

et: Middle English {it}clif{/it}, from Old English; akin to Old High German {it}klep{/it} cliff, Old Norse {it}klif{/it}
shortdef: a very steep, vertical, or overhanging face of rock, earth, or ice : precipice
